news.title: Trump told Israel not to kill Iran's supreme leader - report
news.summary: Trump told Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu that assassinating Khamenei was not a good idea, according to CBS.

news.title: Police operation to target grooming gangs nationwide
news.summary: The National Crime Agency will target grooming gang predators in a new operation, the Home Office says.

news.title: ‘I broke my jaw in half’: Accidents raise questions about funfair safety
news.summary: Hundreds injured by funfair rides over the past decade, a Panorama investigation has found.

news.title: MI6 appoints first female chief in 116-year history
news.summary: Blaise Metreweli joined the Secret Intelligence Service (MI6) in 1999 and will become its 18th chief.

news.title: G7 summit is a big moment for Canada's PM Carney. Here are five things to watch
news.summary: The gathering of leaders in Alberta will be a big test for Canada's new leader. We break down his challenges.

news.title: Truckloads of Scotland's rubbish will be sent to England, experts say
news.summary: Up to 100 trucks a day could take Scotland's waste to England once a landfill ban comes in at the end of the year.

news.title: Watch: Moment people flee church as earthquake interrupts mass in Peru
news.summary: The 5.6 magnitude earthquake struck near Lima, Peru on Sunday morning, causing panic at the city's cathedral.

news.title: Son of Estee Lauder, who took the brand global, dies aged 92
news.summary: Leonard Lauder joined his parents' company in 1958 and served as chief executive for 17 years.

news.title: Hospices are at centre of debate over assisted dying bill - what do they think?
news.summary: As MPs debate whether to legalise assisted dying, we speak to those providing end-of-life care.

news.title: The Papers:  'Retreat over grooming gangs' and 'Say sorry for delay'
news.summary: The prime minister's new call for a national inquiry into grooming gangs features in the papers.
